meta_description: The Chrysler Museum has 50 galleries with 35,000+ objects, an interactive space for kids and families, and an incredible glass studio. Admission is free.
collections_text:
Always Changing. Always Free.

## An encyclopedic collection, family-friendly events, and more.

[Plan your free visit today.](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113113216/https://chrysler.org/visit/ "Plan your free visit today.")

Hot Glass at the Studio

Beginner classes for all ages! No experience required.  [See upcoming classes.](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113113216/https://chrysler.org/glass#4 "See upcoming classes.")

Always Changing. Always Free.

## An encyclopedic collection, family-friendly events, and more.

## Find a unique selection of artful gifts, jewelry, books, toys, and more.

[Shop online](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113113216/http://shop.chrysler.org/ "Shop online") Search the collection

## Browse more than 30,000 works from over 5,000 years.
